services.title: In-Person One-on-One Training
description: Personalized coaching designed to help you achieve your fitness goals.
Introductory and Goal Setting Session: Weâ€™ll kick off with a thorough assessment of your fitness level, medical history, and personal aspirations.
Personalized Workout Program Design: Receive a customized workout plan that aligns with your goals and abilities.
Flexible Scheduling: Enjoy sessions that fit seamlessly into your lifestyle, ensuring you stay committed.

services.title: Virtual Training
description: Stay on track with expert guidance from the comfort of your own home.
Tailored Online Workouts: Get customized training plans delivered digitally, complete with video instructions.
Convenience and Flexibility: Schedule your sessions at your convenience, with real-time feedback during virtual check-ins.

services.title: In-Person Group Training
description: Join forces with friends, family, or partners for a dynamic workout experience!
Engaging Workouts: Participate in sessions designed to meet individual goals within a group setting.
Supportive Environment: Build camaraderie and motivation as you work towards fitness together.
services.pricing: $40 per person per session | $360 per person for 10 sessions

services.title: Dance Technique Privates
description: Enhance and enrich your contemporary, ballet, or dance training.
Whether your skill level is beginner or advanced, I can help take your abilities to new heights.

services.title: Contemporary Masterclasses
description: Book a masterclass for your studio, school, or dance organization.
Teaching abilities include contemporary, ballet, floorwork, and many other styles.
